subject: Automating JUnit tests - early access program for Parabuild
msgSnippet: Hello everyone, First, let me thank Kent Beck for allowing me to make this announcement. Here it goes: Viewtier Systems would like to invite members of JUnit
messageBody:
Hello everyone,

First, let me thank Kent Beck for allowing me to make this
announcement. Here it goes:

Viewtier Systems would like to invite members of JUnit group
to join early access program (EAP) for Parabuild 2.0. Parabuild
is a software build management server that provides Continuous
Integration builds and stable daily builds. Parabuild supports
rendering JUnit XML log results. We are looking to extend
JUnit support and we will appreciate your feedback.

Parabuild home page:
http://www.viewtier.com/products/parabuild/index.htm

We offer free Parabuild licenses for every new bug found in
EAP builds of Parabuild.

Thank you.

Regards,

Slava Imeshev
